title: MAMA THINKS YOU’RE BORING HOODIE DROP
body_html:
MAMA THINKS YOU’RE BORING HOODIE is an oversized hoodie made of a cool white and grey wash with a front stitch of the word “أصيلي”. Featuring on the back a bold puff print of the word “ماما” in pink, and a print of the phrase  “THINKS YOU’RE BORING”. Perfect for relaxed , cool style.

MALE MODEL IS WEARING SIZE X- LARGE .

FEMALE MODEL IS WEARING SIZE MEDIUM .

title: The Asili Ultimate Fur sweater in the colour foggy grey
body_html:
The Asili Ultimate Fur sweater is a soft touch long-sleeve fur sweater with polo collar and front button fastening. Featuring a metal piece on the left side of the chest of the word ”أصيلي".

FEMALE MODEL IS WEARING SIZE MEDIUM .

MALE MODEL IS WEARING SIZE LARGE  .

title: THE ASILI DENIM JACKET
body_html:
The Asili Denim Jacket is a relaxed fit jacket with collar. The jacket has 2 patch pockets on the chest, is finished with dark grey stitching, and is buttoned up front. At the back, on the right bottom side, there is the leather attachment with the word "ASILI."

MALE MODEL IS WEARING SIZE LARGE .

FEMALE MODEL IS WEARING SIZE SMALL .

title: (SET-ELKOL) -ست الكل Hoodie Drop
body_html:
(SET-ELKOL) ست الكل hoodie comes in navy blue colour .The front of the hoodie is plain with a tiny white embroidery of the word “أصيلي”. Whilst the back is an illustration of Umm Kalthum-the exceptional Egyptian singer-alongside the word;
“ست الكل".
MALE MODEL IS WEARING SIZE LARGE

FEMALE MODEL IS WEARING SIZE MEDIUM

title: [PRE-ORDER] THE ASILI MEGA BAGGY JEANS IN CLOUD GREY WITH PINK BUBBLEGUM EMBIRODERY
body_html:
The Asili Mega baggy jeans in cloud grey with pink bubblegum embroidery are mid-waist baggy-fit jeans .From the back on the right side next to the back pocket, the jeans have the word "أصيلي" stitched in baby pink embroidery.

THE GIRL IS WEARING SIZE SMALL AND THE GUY IS WEARING SIZE LARGE

body_html:
The Asili Mega baggy jeans in navy blue with silver embroidery are mid-waist baggy-fit jeans . From the back on the right side next to the back pocket, the jeans have the word "أصيلي" stitched in silver embroidery. 

THE GIRL IS WEARING SIZE SMALL AND THE GUY IS WEARING SIZE LARGE

title: The أصيلي MADNESS KNIT SHIRT IN BLACK
body_html:
The أصيلي MADNESS KNIT SHIRT in the color black is a short-sleeve knit shirt. The shirt is not see-through. From the front on the right side, there is an illustration of the word "أصيلي" in white, while from the back, there is the word “Summertime” in white, and above it, the word “مادنس” in the color grey. On the back top area, right below the collar, there is a metal stainless steel piece with the word “أصيلي".

 

WASHING INSTRUCTIONS:
1-WASH USING COLD WATER.
2-DO NOT HAND WASH.
3-LET THE SHIRT DRY ON A FLAT SURFACE.
4-DO NOT HANG THE SHIRT ON HANGERS, ALWAYS KEEP THE SHIRT FOLDED.

title: The أصيلي MADNESS KNIT SHIRT IN ROYAL BLUE
body_html:
The أصيلي MADNESS KNIT SHIRT in the color Royal Blue is a short-sleeve knit shirt. The shirt is not see-through. From the front on the right side, there is an illustration of the word "أصيلي" in white, while from the back, there is the word “Summertime” in white, and above it, the word “مادنس” in the color yellow. On the back top area, right below the collar, there is a metal stainless steel piece with the word “أصيلي".

 

WASHING INSTRUCTIONS:
1-WASH USING COLD WATER.
2-DO NOT HAND WASH.
3-LET THE SHIRT DRY ON A FLAT SURFACE.
4-DO NOT HANG THE SHIRT ON HANGERS, ALWAYS KEEP THE SHIRT FOLDED.

title: [PRE-ORDER] The أصيلي BUBBLY DENIM TSHIRT
body_html: The أصيلي BUBBLY DENIM TSHIRT in the color Cotton Candy is a softened Denim T-shirt that is plain from the front with a puff print of the word  "أ ص ي ل ي" from the back. The Denim T-shirt has a round neck with an extra white crew neck collar in cotton.

title: THE ASILI BUTTONED JEANS IN WASHED GREY
body_html:
THE ASILI BUTTONED JEANS IN WASHED GREY is a low-rise, loose-fit jeans with buttons throughout the sideline of the jeans legs. From the front there are 2 slash pockets with the name “Asili” stitched under the left pocket in white.
While from the back there are 2 patch pockets . The buttons on the side of the jeans can be opened or closed allowing you to change the fit of the pants.

MALE MODEL IS WEARING SIZE 40.

DON'T SIZE UP.

title: THE ASILI BUTTONED JEANS IN ICE BLUE
body_html:
THE ASILI BUTTONED JEANS IN ICE BLUE  is a low-rise, loose-fit jeans with buttons throughout the sideline of the jeans legs. From the front there are 2 slash pockets with the name “Asili” stitched under the left pocket in white.While from the back there are 2 patch pockets . The buttons on the side of the jeans can be opened or closed allowing you to change the fit of the pants.

FEMALE MODEL IS WEARING SIZE 32.

MALE MODEL IS WEARING SIZE 40.

DON'T SIZE UP

title: [PRE-ORDER] THE ASILI MIGHTY BAGGY JEANS IN BLACKK
body_html:
The Asili Mighty baggy jeans in black are baggy-fit jeans sprayed from the front and back in faded white. From the back on the left leg, the jeans have the word "Asili" stitched in white embroidery. 

MALE MODEL IS WEARING SIZE LARGE .

FEMALE MODEL IS WEARING SIZE SMALL .

title: THE PUFFED SET IN BLUE
body_html:
THE PUFFED SET IN BLUE consists of an oversized hoodie and wide-leg sweatpants. The hoodie has puffed print both at the front and the back. The former is a puff print of the letters A and أ in white. The latter is a puff print of the words "Asili" and "أصيلي" in white.

The sweatpants features an elasticated waistband with two front and two back pockets, soft fabric details, and a wide-leg design. Besides, from the front there is the word "Asili" printed in puff next to the left pocket in the color white.

 

MODEL IS WEARING SIZE X- LARGE .

title: THE PUFFED SET IN GREEN
body_html:
THE PUFFED SET IN GREEN consists of an oversized hoodie and wide-leg sweatpants. The hoodie has puffed print both at the front and the back. The former is a puff print of the letters A and أ in yellow . The latter is a puff print of the words "Asili" and "أصيلي" in yellow.

The sweatpants features an elasticated waistband with two front and two back pockets, soft fabric details, and a wide-leg design. Besides, from the front there is the word "Asili" printed in puff next to the left pocket in the color yellow.

MODEL IS WEARING SIZE MEDIUM .

The sweatpants features an elasticated waistband with two front and two back pockets, soft fabric details, and a wide-leg design. Besides, from the front there is the word "Asili" printed in puff next to the left pocket in the color white.

title: (Lasta Wahdak) لست وحدك Hoodie Drop 10% to 🇵🇸
body_html:
(Lasta Wahdak) لست وحدك hoodie comes in cloudy grey colour. The Hoodie features 2 of the most popular artists ; Abdelhalim Hafez the Egyptian singer as well as Micheal Jackson the American singer.The front of the hoodie is plain with a tiny white embroidery of the word “أصيلي”. Whilst the back is an illustration of both Artist Abdelhalim Hafez and Micheal jackson alongside each’s very famous song;
لست وحدك and you are not alone.

 MALE MODEL IS WEARING SIZE LARGE .

FEMALE MODEL IS WEARING SIZE SMALL .

title: [PRE-ORDER] THE QUESTIONING TSHIRT
body_html:
The QUESTIONING T-SHIRT is a sugar-white oversized short-sleeved t-shirt. The T-shirt has a sugar-white embroidery of the word "أصيلي" on the front. While from the back there is a grey print of the word "أصيلي" and on top of it the question "ARE YOU WHERE YOU WANNA BE YET?"

FEMALE MODEL IS WEARING SIZE SMALL

MALE MODEL IS WEARING SIZE LARGE

title: THE ASILI DUO ZIPPER JEANS
body_html:
The Asili duo zipper jeans is a black denim jeans. The jeans has 2 zippers on the outer side part of each leg . When the zipper is opened the jeans becomes looser, and on the left leg the word "أ ص ي ل ي " appears in light grey stitching. The zippers in the pants when closed will give a straight fit .

MALE MODEL IS WEARING SIZE EUR 38.

FEMALE MODEL IS WEARING SIZE EUR 34.

title: THE ASILI KNITTED COLLECTION (Pyramids’ Coordinates Edition) in Olive Green.
body_html: THE ASILI KNITTED COLLECTION ( Pyramids’ Coordinates Edition) in the color Olive Green is an oversized fit hoodie with a kangaroo pocket . The Asili Knitted Collection is different by which the hoodie is knitted . The Hoodie features the Coordinates of the Great Pyramids of Giza from the back . Whilst , the word "أصيلي" is knitted from the front.

title: [PRE-ORDER] The AL ALIS Hoodie Drop
body_html: The AL ALIS Hoodie comes in the color sugar white . The Hoodie features 2 of the most popular Alis ; Mohamed Ali the American Professional Boxer as well as Mohamed Ali Pasha the Ottoman ruler. The front of the hoodie is plain with a tiny baby pink embroidery of the word “أصيلي”. Whilst the back is an illustration of both Alis.

title: The أصيلي Multi-Way Unisex Cargo in Creamy white
body_html:
The أصيلي Multi-Way Cargo in Creamy White is a straight /baggy fit cargo with adjustable ropes from the waist and the ankle . The adjustable ropes from the waist will adjust the cargos to your waist making it suitable for any waist size for the chosen size so you don’t need to size up. Besides, the adjustable ropes from the bottom can be left so that you can have a straight fit cargo or can be tied so that you can also have that jogger look cargo.Also, the cargo has 5 pockets 2 on the right , 2 on the back and one on the left which has the name أصيلي embroidered under it. The pockets have metal snap buttons to make sure they’re safely closed.

Model is wearing size medium.

title: The أصيلي Multi-Way Unisex Cargo in Charcoal grey
body_html:
The أصيلي Multi-Way Cargo in Charcoal grey is a straight /baggy fit cargo with adjustable ropes from the waist and the ankle . The adjustable ropes from the waist will adjust the cargos to your waist making it suitable for any waist size for the chosen size so you don’t need to size up. Besides, the adjustable ropes from the bottom can be left so that you can have a straight fit cargo or can be tied so that you can also have that jogger look cargo.Also, the cargo has 5 pockets 2 on the right , 2 on the back and one on the left which has the name أصيلي embroidered under it. The pockets have metal snap buttons to make sure they’re safely closed.

Model is wearing size small.
